author: rdonkin
msg: EXLBR-49 LogKit is a dependency of the Avalon Framework so needs to be compiled first. https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/EXLBR-49

author: cmoulliard
msg: Code modified to put "null" in the CSV file created when the field of the model is null

author: marrs
msg: FELIX-1278 changed the semantics of the API, therefore I bumped the version to 3.0.0

author: clement
msg: On windows system the directory manipulation failed because the collected class files contains \ characters and the internal list contains / characters as path separator.
This is fixed by replacing \ by / during the collection.
The fix was tested on Windows and Mac OS.
